2003:
Apple launches the iTunes Store
VoIP, Skype released to the public
MySpace opens its doors
2004:
Google launched Gmail
Digg is launched
Facebook is launched
2006:
Twitter is launched
Google buys YouTube for US$1.65 billion
2007:
Hulu is launched
First iPhone
World of Warcraft surpasses 9 million subscribers
2010:
4G Wireless Networks are launched
Facebook reaches 400 million active users
Smartphones out-sell PCs
2011:
Google+ is launched
Twitter and Facebook play a large role in the Middle East revolts
2012:
SOPA blackout day. Battle to defeat the Stop Online Piracy Act
Pope Benedict XVI joins Twitter
